name: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt - Game of the Year Edition

game.exe: drive_c/GOG Games/The Witcher 3 Wild Hunt GOTY/bin/x64/witcher3.exe

content:
files:
- dx2010: https://lutris.net/files/tools/directx-2010.tar.gz
- setup: N/A:Select the game's setup file
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/The Witcher 3 Wild Hunt GOTY/bin/x64/witcher3.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/dxsetup
    file: dx2010
- task:
    arch: win64
    args: /silent
    executable: $CACHE/dxsetup/DXSETUP.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2012 vcrun2013 win7
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /SP- /NOCANCEL /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    description: Installing Witcher 3
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
  pulse_latency: false
wine:
  Desktop: true
  dxvk: true
  version: lutris-4.12.1-x86_64
